param.name: Execution Frequency
param.desc: Frequency at which task is executed

param.name: CAN Port - Device
param.desc: CAN port used to communicate with the Torqeedo board.

param.name: Motor write divider
param.desc: Write to motor every motor_write_divider times task is run

param.name: Yaw Integral Limit
param.desc: Limit for the integral term mps to Force

param.name: Maximum Heading Error to Thrust
param.desc: Maximum admissable heading error to thrust

param.name: Yaw Rate Integral Limit
param.desc: Limit for the integral term mps to Force

param.name: MPS Force PID Gains
param.desc: PID Force gains for MPS controller

param.name: MPS Force Integral Limit
param.desc: Limit for the integral term mps to Force

param.name: Ramp Actuation Limit
param.desc: Ramp actuation limit when the value is rising in actuation per second

param.name: Minimum Force Limit
param.desc: Minimum value admissible for desired Force

param.name: Maximum Force Limit
param.desc: Maximum value admissible for desired Force

param.name: Maximum force Acceleration
param.desc: Maximum acceleration step to smooth speed ramp in mps control

param.name: RPMs at Maximum Thrust
param.desc: End of scale value for RPM's at 100% of thurst

param.name: Minimum speed to use course
param.desc: Minimum SOG reading required before using course. Else uses heading. Uses heading if -1.

param.name: Log PID Parcels
param.desc: Log the size of each PID parcel

param.name: Minimum timestep accepted
param.desc: Log the size of each PID parcel

param.name: Execution Frequency
param.desc: Frequency at which task is executed

param.name: Active
param.desc: True to activate task, false otherwise

param.name: Skewed Motor Force Factor
param.desc: Factor to reduce forward thrust when differential thrusting.

param.name: Minimum Force Limit
param.desc: Minimum value admissible for desired Force

param.name: Maximum Force Limit
param.desc: Maximum value admissible for desired Force

param.name: Autopilot Max Speed
param.desc: Maximum value admissible given to desiredSpeed in Autopilot mode

param.name: Autopuilot Max Yaw
param.desc: Maximum value admissible given to desiredHeading in Autopilot mode

param.name: Control Frequency
param.desc: Control frequency (< 0 for event-driven EstimatedState processing)

param.name: Along-track -- Minimum Yaw
param.desc: Minimum yaw speed for track bearing convergence

param.name: Cross-track -- Distance Limit
param.desc: Distance threshold value for cross-track error

param.name: Cross-track -- Time Limit
param.desc: Time threshold value for cross-track error

param.name: Position Jump Threshold
param.desc: Threshold for a jump in EstimatedState to turn monitors off

param.name: Position Jump Time Factor
param.desc: Relation between monitor disabling time and position jump

param.name: New Reference Timeout
param.desc: Timeout for new incoming path reference

param.name: Bottom Track -- Enabled
param.desc: Enable or disable bottom track control

param.name: Bottom Track -- Forward Samples
param.desc: Number of samples for forward range moving average

param.name: Bottom Track -- Safe Pitch
param.desc: Safe pitch angle to perform bottom tracking

param.name: Bottom Track -- Slope Hysteresis
param.desc: Slope hysteresis when recovering from avoidance

param.name: Bottom Track -- Minimum Range
param.desc: Minimum admissible forward range for bottom tracking

param.name: Bottom Track -- Check Trend
param.desc: Check slope angle trend in unsafe state

param.name: Bottom Track -- Depth Avoidance
param.desc: Enable or disable obstacle avoidance during depth control

param.name: Bottom Track -- Admissible Altitude
param.desc: Admissible altitude when doing depth control

param.name: Bottom Track -- Minimum Depth
param.desc: Minimum depth to maintain during bottom tracking

param.name: Corridor -- Width
param.desc: Width of corridor for attack entry angle

param.name: Corridor -- Entry Angle
param.desc: Attack angle when lateral track error equals corridor width

param.name: Corridor -- Out Vector Field
param.desc: Out of corridor guidance law: vector field

param.name: Corridor -- Out LOS
param.desc: Out of corridor guidance law: LOS

param.name: Corridor -- Loiter
param.desc: Width of corridor to start loitering

param.name: Loitering Radius
param.desc: Radius of loitering circle after arriving at destination

param.name: Vehicle Type
param.desc: Vehicle type (AUV or UAV), default AUV

param.name: Horizontal Tolerance
param.desc: Minimum distance required to consider that the vehicle has arrived at the reference (XY)

param.name: Vertical Tolerance
param.desc: Minimum distance required to consider that the vehicle has arrived at the reference (Z)

param.name: Default Speed
param.desc: Speed to use in case no speed is given by reference source.

param.name: Default Speed Units
param.desc: Units to use for default speed (one of 'm/s', 'rpm' or '%').

param.name: Default Z
param.desc: Default z when no vertical reference is given.

param.name: Default Z Units
param.desc: Units to use for default z reference (one of 'DEPTH', 'ALTITUDE' or 'HEIGHT')

param.name: Loitering Radius
param.desc: Radius of the loiter when waiting for new waypoint

param.name: Using RemoteState
param.desc: Using remote state for tracking system

param.name: Min Displace
param.desc: Minimum target displacement for computing new heading

param.name: Minimum Safe Distance
param.desc: Minimum safe distance to target system

param.name: Loiter -- Minimum Radius
param.desc: Minimum radius for Loiter to prevent incompatibility with path controller

param.name: StationKeeping -- Minimum Radius
param.desc: Minimum radius for StationKeeping to prevent incompatibility with path controller

param.name: YoYo -- Maximum Pitch Variation
param.desc: Maximum pitch variation step when changing z direction

param.name: YoYo -- Check Path Errors
param.desc: True if we should check path errors and stabilize pitch

param.name: Elevator -- Radius Tolerance
param.desc: Distance tolerance to start loitering near elevator's location

param.name: Elevator -- VMonitor -- Minimum Speed
param.desc: Negative values will disable vertical progress monitor

param.name: Elevator -- VMonitor -- Timeout
param.desc: Timeout when progress is below the specified value

param.name: Elevator -- Minimum Radius
param.desc: Minimum radius to prevent incompatibility with path controller

param.name: PopUp -- Minimum Satellites
param.desc: Least number of satellites to accept fixes

param.name: PopUp -- Minimum Distance
param.desc: Minimum distance between gps_fix position and the estimated state

param.name: PopUp -- Maximum Distance From Station
param.desc: Maximum distance from station keeping radial circle

param.name: PopUp -- Report at PopUps
param.desc: Request reports when popping at surface

param.name: Dislodge -- Bursts
param.desc: Number of bursts with the motor

param.name: Dislodge -- Minimum Distance
param.desc: Minimum distance to ground or object to stop burst

param.name: Dislodge -- Safe Depth Gap
param.desc: Safe depth change to consider the maneuver was successful

param.name: Dislodge -- Safe Depth Gap
param.desc: Safe depth change to consider the maneuver was successful

param.name: ScheduledGoto -- Minimum Speed
param.desc: Move only at speeds higher than the minimum speed

param.name: Sample -- Syringe 0 Id
param.desc: Port to use for syringe 0 servo

param.name: Sample -- Syringe 1 Id
param.desc: Port to use for syringe 1 servo

param.name: Sample -- Syringe 2 Id
param.desc: Port to use for syringe 2 servo

param.name: Sample -- Execution Tolerance
param.desc: Default time tolerance to execute maneuver

param.name: StationKeepingExtended -- Minimum Radius
param.desc: Minimum radius for StationKeepingExtended to prevent incompatibility with path controller

param.name: Altitude Moving Average Samples
param.desc: Number of samples to average altitude measurements (moving window size)

param.name: Minimum Altitude Value
param.desc: Process measured altitude values only if above this threshold

param.name: Report Timeout
param.desc: Timeout threshold to report Entity error

param.name: Default Monitoring -- Hardware
param.desc: Additional default entities to monitor in Hardware profile

param.name: Maximum Consecutive Transitions
param.desc: Maximum number of consecutive transitions before starting to ignore

param.name: Execution Frequency
param.desc: Frequency at which task is executed

param.name: Initial Speed Of Sound
param.desc: The ID of the tracked fish tag

param.name: Initial Temperature
param.desc: The ID of the tracked fish tag

param.name: Initial Salinity
param.desc: Initial value of salinity in PPM

param.name: Initial Depth
param.desc: Initial depth used to calculate Speed of Sound in water

param.name: Use Temperature For Speed Of Sound
param.name-i18n: Use Temperature For Speed Of Sound
param.desc: If any temperature measurements are to be used for updating the speed of sound.

param.name: Temperature - Entity
param.desc: The entity delivering water temperatures for updating the Speed of Sound in water

param.name: Use Salinity For Speed Of Sound
param.name-i18n: Use Salinity For Speed Of Sound
param.desc: If any salinity measurements are to be used for updating the speed of sound.

param.name: Salinity - Entity
param.desc: The entity delivering salinity for updating the Speed of Sound in water

param.name: Use Speed Of Sound Measurement
param.desc: If speed of sound is provided through IMC messages.

param.name: Speed Of Sound - Entity
param.desc: The entity delivering the Speed of Sound in water

param.name: Convert Height to Geoid Height
param.desc: Convert WGS84 height to geoid height (mean sea level) height

param.name: GPS has IMU
param.desc: If false, phi and theta set to zero.

param.name: GPS has Yaw
param.desc: If false, psi is set to cog.

param.name: Active
param.desc: Determines if output has to be used

param.name: WEF Initial Guess
param.desc: Initial guess for estimation of the wave encounter frequency

param.name: Compute Progress
param.desc: True if plan progress should be computed

param.name: Fuel Prediction
param.desc: True if plan's fuel prediction should be computed

param.name: Perform Calibration
param.desc: True if calibration should be performed at all

param.name: Abort On Failed Activation
param.desc: Abort when a payload fails to activate

param.name: StationKeeping Speed in RPM
param.desc: Speed in RPM for the station keeping

param.name: IMU Entity Label
param.desc: Entity label of the IMU for fuel prediction

param.name: Plan Generator Entity Label
param.desc: Entity label of the Plan Generator

param.name: Dive depth
param.desc: Depth to dive in response to 'dive' command

param.name: Traveling depth
param.desc: Depth to use when traveling (Goto maneuvers)

param.name: Dive seconds
param.desc: Time to be under water in response to 'dive' command (seconds)

param.name: Loiter radius
param.desc: Radius of generated loiter and station keeping maneuvers

param.name: RPM Speed
param.desc: Speed in RPMs to be used in the generated maneuvers

param.name: Generate At Boot
param.desc: Set of commands for plans to generate at boot

param.name: Execution Frequency
param.desc: Frequency at which task is executed

param.name: Sentence Order
param.default: GPROT, GPHDM, GPGGA, GPVTG, GPZDA, PASHR

param.name: Serial Port - Device
param.desc: Serial port device used to communicate with the sensor

param.name: Sync Period Ack Timeout
param.desc: Ack should return within before timeout, or error will be output.

param.name: Write full timestamp divider
param.desc: Write full unix timestamp every timestamp_send_divider times task is run. (Not used in PPS mode.)

param.name: Transmission Time
param.desc: Transmission Time used for finding position

param.name: Use PPS
param.desc: If the sensor uses PPS instead of sync messages.

param.name: Execution Frequency
param.desc: Frequency at which task is executed

param.name: Initial Speed Of Sound
param.desc: The ID of the tracked fish tag

param.name: Use Speed Of Sound Measurement
param.desc: If speed of sound is provided through IMC messages.

param.name: Speed Of Sound - Entity
param.desc: The entity delivering the Speed of Sound in water

param.name: Message Wait Time
param.desc: The time to wait for new messages in the while loop between checking timer.

param.name: Reset Toggle
param.desc: When changed, resets buffers and estimators.

param.name: x0
param.desc: Initial X value for the extended Kalman filter (Should not be 0,0,0, as this may give division by zero in estimators.)

param.name: P0
param.desc: Initial P matrix value for the extended Kalman filter, first row

param.name: Qm
param.desc: Process noise covariance matrix for the extended Kalman filter

param.name: SS - Max time shift [ms]
param.desc: Maximum allowed time [ms] shift between receivers' messages

param.name: SS - Receiver Serial number
param.desc: Receiver to use for Single receiver estimators. 0 takes value from first received message.

param.name: SS - Extra Parameters - Name
param.desc: Receiver to use for Single receiver estimators. 0 takes value from first received message.

param.name: SS - Extra Parameters - Value
param.desc: Receiver to use for Single receiver estimators. 0 takes value from first received message.

param.desc: Frequency at which task is executed

param.desc: Name for the lost communciations plan

param.desc: Timeout before sending lost comms plan

param.desc: Name for the lost communciations plan

param.desc: Name for the lost communciations plan

param.name: Execution Frequency
param.desc: Frequency at which task is executed

param.name: Vital Entities
param.desc: Relevant entities that are always considered regardless of ignoring errors during plan execution

param.name: Allows External Control
param.desc: Allow for the vehicle to be externally controlled

param.name: Maneuver Handling Timeout
param.desc: Timeout for starting or stopping a maneuver

param.name: Ignored Interfaces
param.desc: List of interfaces whose services will not be announced

param.name: Loading Order
param.desc: List of messages ordered by loading order

param.name: Reception timeout
param.desc: Maximum amount of seconds to wait for missing fragments in incoming messages

param.name: Flush Interval
param.desc: Number of second to wait before forcing data to be written to disk

param.name: Transports

param.name: Local Port

param.name: Filtered Entities
param.desc: List of <Message>:<Entity>+<Entity> that define the source entities allowed to pass message of a specific message type.

param.name: Announce Service
param.desc: Announce this transport to services or not

param.name: Underwater Communications
param.desc: Allow underwater communication when limited comms are being simulated

param.name: Transports

param.name: Always Transmitted Messages
param.desc: List of messages that will always be transmitted disregarding communication limitations

param.name: Local Messages Only
param.desc: Only transmit messsages from local system.

param.desc: Optional custom service type (imc+udp+<Custom Service Type>), empty entry gives default service (imc+udp)

param.name: Identifiers
param.desc: List of LED identifiers (Names, GPIO number, etc)

param.desc: Amount of time to wait before start blinking LEDs
